title: Marvel vs Capcom 2
description:
MARVEL vs. CAPCOM 2 - New Age of Heroes

Tested and is 100% working.
This is fully english and it is the NTSC U/C(American) version.
Unfortunately, American version does not support ONLINE play so I do not have to teach you how to patch.

Since some of you don't know how to get this to work.

Download DVD Decrypter & WinRAR if you don't have them.
Install them both if you already haven't.

First extract the RAR file to a location.
An ISO file should appear.
Now insert your BLANK DVD+R into your DVD drive.
Open up the ISO file with DVD Decrypter.
Select your write speed as 2.4x.
Hit the burn button.

Now insert your disc into your modchipped installed PlayStation 2.

Marvel vs Capcom 2 - New age of heroes is now playable on your PlayStation 2.

RARed ISO File size - About 128 MB
unRARed ISO File size - About 1.1 GB
